More Kalin Lucas NBA Stats »

NBA Transactions

Jun 23, 2011 - Kalin Lucas went undrafted in the 2011 NBA Draft making him an Unrestricted FA. Sep 3, 2013 - Kalin Lucas signed a contract with the Chicago Bulls. Oct 2, 2013 - The Chicago Bulls placed the contract of Kalin Lucas on waivers. Oct 4, 2013 - Kalin Lucas, previously with the Chicago Bulls, became a free agent. Sep 16, 2014 - Kalin Lucas signed a contract with the Memphis Grizzlies. Oct 25, 2014 - The Memphis Grizzlies placed the contract of Kalin Lucas on waivers. Oct 27, 2014 - Kalin Lucas, previously with the Memphis Grizzlies, became a free agent. Nov 4, 2014 - Kalin Lucas signed a contract with the Memphis Grizzlies. Nov 9, 2014 - The Memphis Grizzlies placed the contract of Kalin Lucas on waivers. Nov 11, 2014 - Kalin Lucas, previously with the Memphis Grizzlies, became a free agent. Nov 19, 2014 - Kalin Lucas signed a contract with the Memphis Grizzlies. Nov 20, 2014 - The Memphis Grizzlies placed the contract of Kalin Lucas on waivers. Nov 22, 2014 - Kalin Lucas, previously with the Memphis Grizzlies, became a free agent. Aug 31, 2017 - Kalin Lucas signed a contract with the Orlando Magic. Oct 14, 2017 - The Orlando Magic placed the contract of Kalin Lucas on waivers. Oct 16, 2017 - Kalin Lucas, previously with the Orlando Magic, became a free agent. Sep 27, 2018 - Kalin Lucas signed a contract with the Sacramento Kings. Oct 13, 2018 - The Sacramento Kings placed the contract of Kalin Lucas on waivers. Oct 15, 2018 - Kalin Lucas, previously with the Sacramento Kings, became a free agent. Jan 15, 2019 - Kalin Lucas signed a two-way contract with the Detroit Pistons. Jul 1, 2019 - Kalin Lucas, previously with the Detroit Pistons, became a free agent. Nov 19, 2020 - The Detroit Pistons renounced their free-agent exception rights to Kalin Lucas.

More Kalin Lucas G League Stats »

G League Transactions

Nov 1, 2013 - Kalin Lucas was allocated to the Iowa Wolves from the Chicago Bulls. Feb 6, 2014 - The Iowa Wolves deactivated Kalin Lucas. Apr 4, 2014 - The Iowa Wolves activated Kalin Lucas. Oct 30, 2014 - Kalin Lucas returned to the Iowa Wolves. Nov 4, 2014 - The Memphis Grizzlies called up Kalin Lucas from the Iowa Wolves. Nov 12, 2014 - Kalin Lucas returned to the Iowa Wolves after an NBA call up. Nov 19, 2014 - The Memphis Grizzlies called up Kalin Lucas from the Iowa Wolves. Nov 20, 2014 - Kalin Lucas returned to the Iowa Wolves after an NBA call up. Mar 14, 2015 - The Iowa Wolves deactivated Kalin Lucas. Mar 19, 2015 - Kalin Lucas early terminated his contract with the Iowa Wolves. Oct 29, 2016 - Kalin Lucas returned to the Iowa Wolves. Dec 21, 2016 - The Iowa Wolves deactivated Kalin Lucas. Dec 23, 2016 - Kalin Lucas was acquired by the Erie BayHawks (2008) from the Iowa Wolves in a trade. Dec 23, 2016 - The Iowa Wolves sent Kalin Lucas in a trade to the Erie BayHawks (2008). Jan 2, 2017 - The Erie BayHawks (2008) deactivated Kalin Lucas. Jan 4, 2017 - The Erie BayHawks (2008) activated Kalin Lucas. Sep 25, 2018 - Kalin Lucas returned to the Lakeland Magic. Sep 25, 2018 - Kalin Lucas was acquired by the Stockton Kings from the Lakeland Magic in a trade. Sep 25, 2018 - The Lakeland Magic sent Kalin Lucas in a trade to the Stockton Kings. Oct 22, 2018 - Kalin Lucas returned to the Stockton Kings. Jan 15, 2019 - Kalin Lucas signed a two-way contract with the Detroit Pistons and Grand Rapids Drive.Jan 15, 2019 - The Detroit Pistons called up Kalin Lucas from the Stockton Kings.
